comment._content:
Possibly Lieutenant William Benjamin ABINGDON Royal Field Artillery as per The National Archives.
1911 Census - William Benjamin Abingdon occupation actor.  Born in Kentish Town c1889.
FreeBMD 
Marriage registration 4th qr 1912 Abingdon William B to Elen Amelia Blackburn 8e 822
Death registration 4th qr 1959 ABINGDON  William age 71 Marylebone 5d 330
